string.value: Mission objectives:|Destroy the enemy fleet in the vicinity of Attans island.
Secondary objectives:|Protect the guided-missile cruiser “Argumento”; finish the mission without losses of vehicles; destroy all enemy forces.
Primary mission objectives completed. Hostile presence near the player is absent.|Do you wish to end the mission?
You are leaving the combat zone in a direction of the territory currently under control of the enemy.||This will result in a loss of your vehicle and possible mission failure.
